long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OrganizeGPT is a productivity extension designed to help users of ChatGPT organize their conversation history effectively. It allows you to create custom folders for categorizing chats, making it easy to find and revisit conversations. With simple drag-and-drop functionality, you can organize chats into folders that suit your workflow or topics of interest. The extension integrates seamlessly with the ChatGPT interface, giving you a clean, organized sidebar that feels natural to use. All folders and organized chats are saved in Chrome’s sync storage, so they stay consistent across devices. Perfect for anyone who relies on ChatGPT for projects, studies, or ongoing conversations.
